trends: There has been one other sighting in Chalmette
There were no other sightings in Chalmette on or around June 15th 2006
Summary: I first saw the object at almost a hover coming toward were I was running my pump truck at about 100 feet high and then it turned and was gone with in a few seconds.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsI had went to challmet la. to help clean up after katrena.My job was to run a pump truck pumping water as all the pump stations for the city was off line.I had been on the job for only 2 weeks or so.I had made a stop at one of my pump holes,(man holes).It was across the street from one of the many camper lots that were set up for the flooded out residence of the city.I got my truck set up pumping and it takes several minutes,(about 15) to load the truck.As soon as I got started I had a five gallon bucket I was using for a seat with not a lot to do but wait on my truck to load.I have always been a big time star gazer so I kinda enjoyed my chances to do just that while I waited for my truck to do its thing.Well anyway,as I was sitting there looking around somthing caught my eye coming in my direction from over the campers.At first I thought it was a plane or something but I reallized it was only about 100 feet high,(If that)and was going so slow that I could have ran and stayed under it if it had maintained the same speed and direction.I jumped up off my bucket and ran around to the other side of my truck trying to figure out what to heck it was.It kinda put me in mind of one of the stealth planes in the way it was shaped and it had maby 8 lights around the front.I have a hard time describing the color of the lights,They were all the same and I guess you could call them white but they were the coolest lights I have ever saw.the object moved straight above where I was standing in a state of AWWW and it turned to port with no apparent banking,it was like it was pretty much floating.The craft did have windows but I could not make out any thing of the inside nor did I see anybody.Once it made its turn It began to climb and gane speed at an incredable rate,From being straight above me to out of sight took maby 3 seconds.IT WAS CRASY!!!!Also the craft made no noise what so ever!!!!I know the government would want to tell me that I saw a swamp gas meteorite weather balloon radar deflector with dummies flying it but they can kiss my nevermind!!!!I know what I saw and nothing will ever change that.It is about time for the people that we put in to office to run this country on our behalf to stop thinking there better than the rest of the world!!!We the people are what gives them the resources to gain the information that they are keeping from us like we are all a bunch of kids or something.It is way past time for us to be given the truth about all the things going on.If you guys need any help in your research,please give me a chance.If I had access to the quality video equipment and enough funding to quit my day job I would dedicate my life to the research.cameras pointing skyward from dusk till dawn seven nights a week and more!!!!The truth is out there and we all have the right to know what the government knows and with enough rock solid evidence they will have to come clean eventually.I have always beleaved in ufo's and that night in challmette changed my life forever.If you need someone else to help in this ongoing project,PLEASE KEEP ME IN MIND.Well,Good luck hunting and maby we will all know the real truth soon.I will contact you again if I get lucky enough to witness another swamp gas meteorite weather balloon radar deflector with dummies flying it.Thank you very much for your time.William Wilson P.S.watch the nasa channel when they send up the shuttle,they try to hide objects by changing camera shots but there are things zooming back and forth and up and down that aint no satalite or space junk.Once again thanks for listoning,Bill
